title: Shares of several industrial companies are trading lower as equities sell off following recent rally. Stocks have rallied over the past week amid optimism towards the US economy reopening and investors have potentially taken some profits following run up.

Shares of several industrial companies are trading higher on continued upward momentum surrounding the economy reopening, which would increase consumer spending and economic activity. New York City moved into phase one of its reopening plan on Monday.
